categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Prie was a female Jedi Padawan. She and her master spent most of their time on undeveloped worlds, protecting new settlements. Years before the Invasion of Naboo, she was a crèche-mate of Obi-Wan Kenobi, who recalled she had once even ridden a horned beast two meters high.
Prie is mentioned in the 2019 novel Master & Apprentice, by Claudia Gray.
